[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/638/sitelogol.png/][IMG]http://img638.imageshack.us/img638/4521/sitelogol.png[/img][/URL]
Legit-pkz.org
[b]Legit-pkz development thread, The only Pvp based economic server where nothing is half-assed![/b]
-8gb Dedi -No memory leaks/ deadlocks/ char[];/byte[]; leaks! -100% Korasi spec(magic based) -Webclient -Fullscreen desktop client -100% hybriding switches -barrage orbs -508 maps -Most advanced PI -Best combat system -No memory leaks/dupes/deadlocks -Best economy ever based on pvp! -Wildy ditch -Deep wildy pking! -Obelisks -Fading hiticons , new updated icons -Great forum integration -Vote4cash -Fading hitmarks -Autodonations
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/232/ad6d.jpg/][IMG]http://img232.imageshack.us/img232/5029/ad6d.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/833/adforlegit.jpg/][IMG]http://img833.imageshack.us/img833/5262/adforlegit.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/696/fullscreene.jpg/][IMG]http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/5436/fullscreene.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/35/legitpkzad2.jpg/][IMG]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/7621/legitpkzad2.jpg[/img][/URL]
